Interface AbstractDitherHolder

All Known Implementing Classes:
FilterLiteDither, FloydImageDither, OrderedDithering, StandardDithering
public interface AbstractDitherHolder

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Dithers the buffer using the given width.

  • Method Details

    • dither

      void dither​(int[] buffer, int width)
      Dithers the buffer using the given width.
      Parameters:
      buffer - data for the image
      width - units for the image

      Dithers the buffer into the ByteBuffer.

      buffer - data for the image
      width - units for the image
      Returns:
